name: market for pump, 40W | pump, 40W | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5205/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'pump, 40W', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the product of a pump, 40W. It is a water pump based on Grundfos UP 15-35x20 model, with a capacity of 40W for use in solar collector systems. The process includes the building materials and their end-of-life but it excludes energy consumption during the production and infrastructure for factory.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'pump, 40W',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'pump, 40W',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2812:Manufacture of fluid power equipment
